title: Turkey Reds for sale, including Matty, Lajoie

posts.post_title: Turkey Reds for sale, including Matty, Lajoie
posts.post_content:
Mathewson was removed from a PSA 3 holder.  It has no pinholes and no creases.  Dygert has a horizontal crease at the bottom of the image that is difficult to see in the scan.  The no ad Devlin is graded SGC 40.

Click below for scans and prices:
